markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Chohar (The Golden Lion)](/Deities.aspx?ID=215)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

The Lion God of justice, loyalty, and work. He is most commonly depicted as a golden lion with a sun for a mane. Some priests of Walkena claim that the child god is a descendant of Chohar, because of their shared love of justice—yet Walkena's justice is vindictive and cruel, while Chohar's is one of duty.

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Old Sun Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=19)

**Edicts** finish any and all tasks you accept, bring those who are cruel to justice, show pride in your home and your heritage

**Anathema** break your word, be cruel to the innocent, rebuke someone due to their homeland

**Area of Concern**
justice, loyalty, and work

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, NG

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Favored Weapon** [Starknife](/Weapons.aspx?ID=44)

**Domains** [Cities](/Domains.aspx?ID=3), [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Toil](/Domains.aspx?ID=39), [Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=37)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)

- **3rd**
[Fireball](/Spells.aspx?ID=119)

- **4th**
[Fire Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=118)

</column>
name: Chohar (The Golden Lion)
